trends: There has been one other sighting in South Haven
There were no other sightings in South Haven on or around September 18th 2012
Summary: Orange fire ball moving slowly and flickering
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside somkeing with my son and with both saw a slow moving obeject in the sky wich looked like a huge fireball. It was orange in color and flickering. It was observed for about one min to a min a some change. This is the second time in the last 2 months I have seen something like this. Whats the Govt got going on up there?
